title: John Horatio Malkovich: Dance of Despair and Disillusionment
featuredTitle: John Horatio Malkovich: Dance of Despair and Disillusionment
description: The enigmatic John Malkovich, one of the world’s greatest entertainers and the man who reinvented how we view puppeteering. Take a look at the man above the strings and the woman behind the man.
quote: Art always tells the truth, even when it’s lying.
